DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether brief counsel intervention couple rapid HIV test feasible effective decreasing alcohol consumption sexual risk behavior among young , unhealthy drinker present Emergency Department .
DOC.brief_title: HIV Testing Brief Alcohol Intervention Young Drinkers Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: 1840 year old ; engage least one sexual risk behavior past 90 day ; alcohol consumption great NIAAA guideline atrisk drink ; unknown negative HIV status willing test ; able provide contact information followup ; able provide write informed consent . know HIV positive status ; medically psychiatrically unstable .
